name: 2023 The 11th International Conference on Computer and Communications Management
content: Conference Proceedings: Submitted papers will be peer reviewed by conference committees, and accepted papers after proper registration and presentation will be published in the Conference Proceedings, which will be indexed by Ei Compendex, Scopus, etc. Journal Publication: Journal of Communications (Website: http://www.jocm.us/, DOI: 10.12720/jcm, Abbreviated Title: J.
